main.title: Trump statement on ‘Maduro capture’ during US attack on Venezuela
main.description: US President Donald Trump says that Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has been captured.

related.title: Trump statement on ‘Maduro capture’ during US attack on Venezuela
related.description: US President Donald Trump says that Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has been captured.

related.title: Trump launches 'large scale' attack on Venezuela, captures Nicolas Maduro and wife
related.description: Maduro and his wife were captured and removed from the country following the operation, Trump said in a statement on Truth Social.

related.title: Donald Trump launches attack on Venezuela
related.description: Explosions reported in Caracas after weeks of pressure from Washington
